channel.title: Music on Tyler Clavelle
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Tyler Clavelle

item.title: Phish by the Numbers
item.description: “My geekiness is getting in the way of my nerdiness” - Patton Oswalt Phish is a quartet and stalwarts of the modern jam band scene they helped create in the late 80’s. Like their Deadhead contemporaries, Phish fans (phans) have an almost unhealthy obsession with the music, speaking in reverential tones of near mythical versions of songs, like 2015’s Tweezer -> Prince Caspian, while endlessly debating the details (for the record, no, I do not think they went back into Tweezer).
